description: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a .NET Project management component that enables .NET applications to not only read and manipulate Microsoft Project documents in MPP and XML formats but to also write Microsoft Project documents in MPP or Project XML format - all without using Microsoft Project.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
TASKS-33127 - [BaseImageRenderParam] 3 out of 4 constructors do not work
TASKS-33219 - Tasks not shown in (Gantt chart view) when Newly created MPP opened in MSP 2010
TASKS-33224 - Blank Tasks name for MPP ver 2003
TASKS-33230 - Aspose Task Ids Mismatch with MS Project
TASKS-33211 - Updated MPP 2003 project's Gantt view is not updated automatically
TASKS-33216 - Extended Attributes Issue while reading MPP/XML
Enhancements
TASKS-28952 – Rendering of whole Gantt chart to one image
TASKS-32184 – Render Project to multipage TIFF
TASKS-33179 - Render all the pages with a single API call (PDF, TIFF, other)
summary: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a component to work with Project files
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
